org.paces.Stata.StringUtils.Similarity

Class DistanceMetrics

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.paces.Stata.StringUtils.Similarity.DistanceMetrics

  • public class DistanceMetrics
extends Object
    Class provides a wrapper to string utilities in the Apache Commons Language library specifically focusing on string distance methods.
    Version:
    0.0.0
    Author:
    Billy Buchanan

        public List<Boolean> getMetricList()
        Method to place all of the booleans for distance metrics into a single container object
        Returns:
        A List of booleans indicating which similarity/distance metrics will be estimated
